integrate.q: Do I need to integrate with my CRM to use Cursale?
integrate.a: No. Integration is optional. A simple briefing already activates the AI with contextual suggestions.

crms.a: Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive, Zoho, and any CRM with an open API.

realtime.q: Does Cursale work in real time?
realtime.a: Yes. Suggestions appear during the call, in real time.

secure.a: Yes. Everything is encrypted and compliant with GDPR and LGPD.

training.q: Do I need to train the AI with lots of data?
training.a: No. Provide basic context about the client and the product. Cursale understands and acts.

copy.before: Get AI-powered help based on your data — or simply tell us who the client is and what you’re selling.
copy.highlight: Cursale adapts and acts in seconds.
